We have for sale for you this EXCLUSIVE DUPLEX, very close to El Corte Inglés, at the beginning of Pardaleras.
The house with 275 m2 built, is divided into 2 floors:

On the main floor we have a large entrance hall, a living room of more than 30 m2, a living-dining room and a living room, all connected with sliding doors. Also on this floor we have a suite with a bathroom and several built-in wardrobes.
On the upper floor we have 4 bedrooms (3 doubles and one single) and two bathrooms. All bedrooms have fitted wardrobes.

The qualities of the house are maximum: wooden floors, double glazed windows, several balconies facing the street, individual natural gas heating, 2 cold/heat pumps (independent for the 2 floors), white doors, marble bathrooms. (some recently renovated).
2 very large parking spaces and a storage room included in the price.

Beautiful Villa in Los Montitos, an urbanized, quiet and restful area just a few minutes from Badajoz.
It consists of a plot of 516 m2 and a constructed area of 306 m2 according to cadastre.
The property has two floors and a basement with a porch and access to the garden.
On the first floor, it consists of a hall, bathroom, kitchen furnished with appliances, a bedroom and a large living room with spectacular views over Badajoz.
On the second floor, four large bedrooms and two bathrooms.
The property is tiled on 50% of the land and the other 50% is landscaped with fruit trees. It also has a large garage, outdoor toilet and storage room.
The property has water from Badajoz and well water, having the entire automated irrigation system, independent air conditioning per floor.

Extremadura (in Extremaduran: Estremaúra; in Fala: Ixtremadura or Extremadura)5 is an autonomous community of Spain located in the center-west of the Iberian Peninsula. It is made up of the two largest provinces in the country: Cáceres and Badajoz, whose capitals are its two most populated cities. The region, whose population amounts to 1,059, 501 inhabitants (INE 2021), has its capital in Mérida.

The region is bordered to the north by the Central System, where the highest point of the autonomous community is located, the Calvitero (2405 m), and to the south by the western foothills of the Sierra Morena, with most of its surface area forming part of the river basins of the Tagus and Guadiana rivers, separated by the Montes de Toledo.

Palma de Mallorca5 (officially Palma)678 is a Spanish city and municipality, the capital of the island of Mallorca and of the autonomous community of the Balearic Islands. It is also the seat of the third judicial district of the province and of the diocese of Mallorca. It is located in the western part of the Mediterranean Sea and, within the island, to the southwest. It is located about 250 km east of the Iberian Peninsula.

Its municipal area covers an area of 208.63 km² that extends between the Sierra de Na Burguesa and the Prado de Sant Jordi. It is located in the center of the bay of Palma, about 13 m above sea level. It is crossed by several torrents, such as the Riera and the Gros.

With 416,065 inhabitants in January 2019, Palma is the eighth largest city in Spain by population and the first in the Balearic Islands. 9 Its metropolitan area includes nine towns with 560,240 inhabitants, spread over an area of 1015.88 km², being the 14th in Spain. 10.
